title: QIAN(BSC) Marketing using of KUN No.1
body:
Detailed information: https://forum.qian.finance/t/publicity-and-voting-for-marketing-and-team-allocation-and-marketing-using-of-kun-to-be-started/392

According to the application post sent by Jaex Exchange and the success of CoinEx's KUN listing activities, the dev team are now applying to the community for the following token expenditures for market activities:

Pay 5,000 KUN to Jaex Exchange as an incentive for users of the trading competition;

Pay 50,000 KUN to the address "0xaa……f98" for the tokens of CoinEx listing activities.

KUN holders who is interested in participating in this vote, please register for KUN lock-up before 7:59 pm on February 2, 2021, Singapore time. The voting will be online at 9:00 pm on February 2, 2021, Singapore time.

Voting time: 24 hours

KUN 市场支出审批（第一次）

根据 Jaex 交易所发来的申请帖子，以及 CoinEx 上线的活动内容，现向社区申请进行以下市场活动代币支出，望 DAO 友们批准：

支付给 Jaex 交易所 5,000 KUN，作为交易大赛的用户激励；

支付给地址 “0xaa……f98”50,000 KUN，支付 CoinEx 上币市场活动的代币；

请参加本次投票的朋友，在新加坡时间 2021 年 2 月 2 日 19:59 之前进行 KUN 锁仓和投票注册，投票将于新加坡时间 2021 年 2 月 2 日 21:00 开始。

投票时间：24小时
author: 0xDb80BD4f295623D50c2019581624454d07f070be
